item.title: CEO Yelp is amazed by results of Monocle
item.description: Yelp CEO Jeremy Stoppelman talks about the companyâ€™s launch of Monocle, which started as an easter egg coded by an intern. Via @lukewdesign http://www.augmentedrealityblog.eu/2010/04/02/ceo-yelp-is-amazed-by-results-of-monocle/

item.title: A Christmas Time Easter Egg on Flickr
item.description: That's BJ Fogg in my wireframe screenshot on Flickr, sporting a Santa hat and beard. This was spotted via Lifehacker. Add a note with the text "ho ho ho hat" to get the hat, and "ho ho ho beard" for the beard. I ♥ Flickr. http://www.flickr.com/photos/jibbajabba/3118649132/
